channel.title: How to start an affiliate program with a Stripe hosted checkout?
channel.description:
Our checkout at Content Koala is a very simple Stripe hosted checkout.
Our business could really benefit from an affiliate program. However, I can only find a way to do this for WooCommerce or full Stripe integration via partners. No simple way of doing it for a hosted Stripe Checkout.
I am guessing that there may be a solution that involves unique link generation and simply tracking those via my Google Analytics?
But if any of you have an elegant solution that would be great :slight_smile:
Thanks!

item.title: How to start an affiliate program with a Stripe hosted checkout?
item.dc:creator: bradycassidy
item.description:
@Content_Koala take a look at Rewardful. We have a very simple integration that’s built specifically for Stripe’s hosted checkout.

Read full topic
item.source: How to start an affiliate program with a Stripe hosted checkout?
